Show / Hide Table of Contents

Class ShakeInstance

A container that holds data for a shake instance. You can modify shake data here and any Shakers that use this instance will buse the updated data.

ShakeInstance(IShakeParameters, Nullable<Int32>)

Creates a new ShakeInstance using the given ShakeData.

Declaration
public ShakeInstance(IShakeParameters shakeData, int? seed = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IShakeParameters shakeData

The ShakeData containing the shake strength, roughness, fading, and influences.
System.Nullable<System.Int32> seed

The seed to use for the shake. Using the same seed will result in the same shake movement.

Declaration
public ShakeInstance(int? seed = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Nullable<System.Int32> seed

An optional seed to use for the shake. Using the same seed will result in the same shake movement.

Fields

| Improve this Doc View Source

RemoveWhenStopped

Should this shake instance be removed from its Shaker when it is stopped? You can set this to false if you want to start a shake again after it has been stopped.

Declaration
public bool RemoveWhenStopped
Field Value
Type Description
System.Boolean
| Improve this Doc View Source

RoughnessScale

A scalar value for the roughness. You can modify this if you want to adjust the roughness of the shake wihout overwriting the original roughness.

Declaration
public float RoughnessScale
Field Value
Type Description
System.Single

ShakeParameters

The original shake parameters. Note that modifying these parameters will overwrite the original values.

StrengthScale

A scalar value for the shake strength. You can modify this if you want to adjust the strength of the shake wihout overwriting the original strength.

Is the shake completely finished? Once a shake is finished, any Shakers that use it will remove it from their active shakes.

TogglePaused(Single)

If the shake is paused, resume it. If the shake is not paused, pause it.

Updates the shake timers and returns the resulting shake values.

Declaration
public ShakeResult UpdateShake(float deltaTime)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Single deltaTime

The delta time value to use. Typically this will be Time.deltaTime.
